name: download_template
description: Downloadable resource or lead magnet | USE: download, free resource, lead magnet, downloadable content, freebie, ebook | NOT: app download (use app_promo), product sale, job posting

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: Enter URL for the background image
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter URL for the logo image
fieldPrompt.title: Enter the main title text (e.g., Download)
fieldPrompt.title_span: Enter the title span text (e.g., Free Guide)
fieldPrompt.subtitle: Enter the subtitle text
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Enter the CTA button text (e.g., www.dolze.ai)
fieldPrompt.bottom_image_url: Enter URL for the bottom image
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace the default template structure

components.html_content:
${website_url}
${title} ${title_span}
${subtitle}
${cta_text}
${custom_html}
